Package cams.controller.suggestion

Class SuggestionManager

java.lang.Object
cams.controller.suggestion.SuggestionManager
public class SuggestionManager extends Object
This class handles the logic and processing related to suggestions.

  • Constructor Details

    • SuggestionManager

      public SuggestionManager()

  • Method Details

    • createSuggestion

      public static void createSuggestion(String message) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a suggestion and adds it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      message - Suggestion message.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - if a suggestion with the same ID is already in the repository.

    • deleteSuggestion

      public static void deleteSuggestion(String suggestionID) throws ModelNotFoundException, OperationCancelledException, AlreadyProcessedException
      Deletes a suggestion in the repository. Will ask for confirmation. Users cannot delete a suggestion if it has been processed.
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - ID of the suggestion to delete.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - if suggestion cannot be found in the repository.
      OperationCancelledException - if user chooses to cancel operation.
      AlreadyProcessedException - if the suggestion has already been processed.

    • editSuggestion

      public static void editSuggestion(String suggestionID, String newMessage) throws ModelNotFoundException, AlreadyProcessedException
      Edit suggestion message. Users cannot edit a suggestion if it has been processed.
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - ID of the suggestion to edit.
      newMessage - The new suggestion message.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - when suggestion with ID cannot be found in the repository.
      AlreadyProcessedException - when suggestion has already been processed.

    • getList

      public static List<Suggestion> getList()
      Gets a list of all the suggestions in the repository.
      Returns:
      list of suggestions in the repository.

    • getListByCampID

      public static List<Suggestion> getListByCampID(String campID)
      Gets a list of suggestions of a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of camp.
      Returns:
      List of suggestions of the specified camp.

    • getListByUserID

      public static List<Suggestion> getListByUserID(String userID)
      Gets a list of suggestions created by a user.
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of the user.
      Returns:
      list of suggestions made by the specified user.

    • getListByCampIDList

      public static List<Suggestion> getListByCampIDList(List<String> campIDList)
      Gets a list of suggestions of a list of camps.
      Parameters:
      campIDList - List of camps to retrieve suggestions for.
      Returns:
      List of suggestions retrieved.

    • getUnprocessedListByCampIDList

      public static List<Suggestion> getUnprocessedListByCampIDList(List<String> campIDList)
      Gets a list of unprocessed suggestions from a list of camps.
      Parameters:
      campIDList - List of camps to retrieve suggestions for.
      Returns:
      List of unprocessed suggestions.

    • approveSuggestion

      public static void approveSuggestion(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Approve a suggestion.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of suggestion to approve.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - when suggestion with ID not found in the repository.

    • rejectSuggestion

      public static void rejectSuggestion(String ID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Reject a suggestion.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of suggestion to reject.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - when suggestion with ID not found in the repository.
